channel.title: CVE Feed for unitecms -- Blox Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unitecms -- Blox Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-6315|2024-08-06T19:42:11.065Z -- unitecms -- blox%20page%20builder
item.description: The Blox Page Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the 'handleUploadFile' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.65. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level and above permissions, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-6315|2024-08-06T01:49:57.531Z -- unitecms -- blox%20page%20builder
item.description: The Blox Page Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the 'handleUploadFile' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.65. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level and above permissions, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.
